name: 7th International Conference on Epidemiology and Public Health
content: 7th International Conference on Epidemiology and Public Health An extensive range of critically important sessions from basic research to recent innovations. The theme: “To discuss unprecedented challenges in building Global Public Health” is designed for professionals at all levels and career phases of the Epidemiology and Public Health researchers, who want to improve their understanding of what will drive and shape the future of the market. We would like to invite you to the upcoming conference on “7th International Conference on Epidemiology and Public Health” Which is going to be held on November 21-22, 2023 at Rome, Italy Visit: https://epidemiology.euroscicon.com/ Abstract Link: https://epidemiology.euroscicon.com/abstract-submission Registration Link: https://epidemiology.euroscicon.com/registration Online Registrations and Abstract submission are open. Submit the abstract and confirm your slot Benefits for Conference: 1\. Keynote certificate / speaker Certificate 2\. CPD certificate / CME certificate 3\. Best speaker / best young researcher award 4\. Journal Publication with ISSN number 5\. Separate Biography and research page in website.10:00AM 07:00PM 6\. Conference Kit 7\. Lunch and breakfast. If you have any queries, do not hesitate to Contact us. Regards Pricilla siara EPIDEMIOLOGY Team E-mail: pricillasiara@gmail.com Whatsapp: +44 7389646103
organizers: 7th International Conference on Epidemiology and Public Health
